attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248729. **EXTRAS VALUED OVER R75000**
**BALANCE OF MANUFACTURERS WARRANTY**
**BALANCE OF MANUFACTURERS MAINTENANCE PLAN**
**2.0 GTI/147KWS**
**DSG**
**PANORAMIC SUNROOF**
**9.2 INCH DIGITAL COCKPIT**
**APP CONNECT/ANDROID AUTO/APPLE CAR PLAY**
**18 INCH ALLOY WHEELS**
**LED/XENON HEADLIGHTS**
**REVERSING CAMERA**
**FRONT & REAR PDC**
**HEATED FRONT SEATS**
**ADVANCED SAFETY PACKAGE**

The Polo GTI has long been one of the more conservative offerings in the segment, and that tradition continues both in terms of its balance of performance and livability and its understated styling. With a roomier cabin, the most noticeable additions here are subtle red stitching, a facia trim and comfortable sports seats with an excellent finish. Options here include Discover Media navigation (R12 150), the second-generation version of VW’s superb active info display (R8 650), a panoramic sunroof (R10 550) and leather upholstery with heating for the front pews (R9 850). 

Given the Polo GTI's performance, the promise of more than 50mpg fuel economy is impressive. It's worth remembering that in any car – especially performance models – you're unlikely to come close to the claimed figures if you exploit the car's potential to the full.

attributes.description:
DEMO MODEL!!! Active service plan Balance of 49months or 61500km Service Plan!!!

ENQUIRE NOW and you will be connected to one of our professional sales executives who will gladly bring the vehicle out to you to test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. ENQUIRE NOW and we will tailor make a finance package that will not only suite your need but you pocket too as we deal through all major finance institutions and will fight for the best rate in town. ALL TRADE INS WELCOME AND WE OFFER NATIONWIDE DELIVERY

Why Ford Approved
All our vehicles have passed our stringent 160-point check
160-point checks mean that you have peace of mind that all the vehicles listed here have been screened in order to meet our high standards of approval.

Our vehicles have a full-service history
None of our vehicles have been registered for more than 5 years old
Our vehicles have a maximum mileage of 120 000km
We get our cars’ mileage readings verified
Our vehicles come with the balance of Manufacturer’s Warranty - or a new warranty
The Balance of the Service Plan and Maintenance Plan is included
We offer Roadside Assistance for 12 months
We accept all trade-ins
We offer test drives on all our used vehicles
